name: Student
text: I found a hidden door here!

name: Student
text: It might lead us where is everyone at.

name: Joseph
text: You got a nice eye huh.

name: Joseph
text: From what I see, it is lock shutted.

name: Joseph
text: It would be good to have a key that can access the door in this factory

name: Joseph
text: Did you find anything like that?

name: Student
text: I got something like a piece of metal from that monster we fought.

name: Joseph
text: this is the key we want... but it seem to be just a part of it.

name: Student
text: So you saying we can't use that thing huh?

name: Joseph
text: There always have the second choice.

name: Joseph
text: By the way, I believe if we got five of this piece of metal.

name: Joseph
text: Then we are able to combine it into the key.

name: Joseph
text: Let's divied into two and investigate around this area for now then, we might got something good.
